TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-tacin, title = nipaluma-tacin, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-tacin} }

S.FORM: == tacin == u siwkay nu nipaluma pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u cudad a ngangan: u sapamat a ngangan: u Amilika a ngangan: u zuma a cidekay a kamu Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: x Taluku: x Yuwatan: masanglav tu lisavdaing Rukay: x Cou: cuun takarura Kabalan: x Kanakanabu: x Laaluwa: x Saysia: x Puyuma: x Saw: x Tau: x u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 大青 taching u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay Yuwatan, Sakizaya, Cou

== tacin == o siwkay no nipaloma pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o codad a ngangan: o sapamat a ngangan: o Amilika a ngangan: o zoma a cidekay a kamo Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: x Taloko: x Yowatan: masanglav to lisavdaing Rokay: x Coo: coon takarora Kabalan: x Kanakanabo: x Laalowa: x Saysia: x Poyoma: x Saw: x Tao: x o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam 大青 taching o solit no Lipon o solit no Amilika saongay misapayo' a cidekay Yowatan, Sakizaya, Coo
